targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value
FROM temperature
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value AS "value"
FROM temperature
WHERE  $__timeFilter("time") AND module='indoor'

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value AS "value"
FROM temperature
WHERE  $__timeFilter("time") AND module='outdoor'

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value AS "value"
FROM humidity
WHERE  $__timeFilter("time") AND module='indoor'

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value AS "value"
FROM humidity
WHERE  $__timeFilter("time") AND module='outdoor'

SELECT
  time AS "time",

FROM co2

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  module AS metric,
  value AS "value"
FROM rain
WHERE  $__timeFilter("time") AND module='rain'
